svg.title: Blomst innmat
svg.desc: Innmat i en blomst, bearbeidet av Eirik Hanssen. Modifisert figur av Mariana Ruiz (LadyofHats). Kilde: https://commons.wikimedia.org/wiki/User:LadyofHats/gallery2#/media/File:Mature_flower_diagram.svg Opphavsrett: denne figuren slippes i det fri.

Flower internals, reworked by Eirik Hanssen. Modified/traced illustration by Mariana Ruiz (LadyofHats). Source: https://commons.wikimedia.org/wiki/User:LadyofHats/gallery2#/media/File:Mature_flower_diagram.svg Copyright: this illustration is released into the public domain.
